LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Login with your credentials
LOGIN.PERSON_BLOCKED: Your account is disabled. Please get in touch with a system administrator
LOGIN.PASSWORD_EXPIRED: The password expired. Please set a new password first
LOGIN.PASSWORD_EXPIRED_SAFE: The safe-password expired. Please set a new password first
LOGIN.NO_PROVIDER_SELECTED: Please select an provider from the list
LOGIN.ACTION_HELP: In case of login issues please get in touch with your provider.
LOGIN.SAFE_PREVIOUS: In order to login to the safe space, please login to the regular workspace first
LOGIN.NO_ACCESS: No permissions to access this area

LOGIN_APP.SERVERLIST_INFO: Choose the server you like to connect with.
LOGIN_APP.SERVERURL_INFO: Enter the URL of the server you like to connect to.
LOGIN_APP.SERVERURL_NOHTTPS: HTTP instead of HTTPS is not secure.
LOGIN_APP.NOTINTERNET_SUB: Not able to load the server listing.
LOGIN_APP.NOTINTERNET_TEXT: Please check the internet connection. Then try again or exit the app to try again later.
